title: ‘How We Got On’, ‘Jack’s Memoirs: Off the Road’ & Ryan Humbert
teaser: Dee Perry welcomes award-winning playwright Idris Goodwin whose acclaimed play How We Got On is onstage now at Cleveland Play House through November 16.  Plus we look into Jack's Memoirs:Off The Road A Novel with author Kurt Landefeld.  And singer-songwriter Ryan Humbert shares tracks from his latest recording Halfway Home prior to his concert at The Kent Stage Friday, November 7.
